message:
H,

Sorry to intrude your mailbox.

I saw you linked to http://reactjs.org/docs/forms.html from https://blog.stephencleary.com/2013/11/taskrun-etiquette-examples-dont-use.html

I would like to bring to your attention a resource I recently created â€“ Guru99. https://www.guru99.com/reactjs-tutorial.html  The content is up to date and very in-depth.

I did be obliged if you link to it.

As a thankyou, I would be glad to share your page with our 27k Facebook/Twitter/Linkedin Followers.

Thanks!
Alex
